Skills

What I use in my work

HTML5

It creates the framework of your site or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure of your product.

CSS3

This style language allows me to create absolutely any look of your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!

Java Script

This programming language allows you to animate anything: sliders, windows, hints, tabs, retrieving data from the server and much more.

Jquery

The Jquery library will speed up development. We will not integrate it into the project without the need, but the skill of working with it is present.

Node.js

This platform allows you to create a backend for your product - "brains" that will perform actions that the user does not see.

React

This library allows you to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product just for your goals.

Mongo.db

This is a non-relational database that will store data from your site or application.
